function ProblemSection(props) { return ( <>

how to gather knowledge, when starting to building Ethereum products?

{/* put together images from prosytethis vitalik twitter icon reddit icon weekinethereum icon or evan ... */}

the experienced community member wants to get rewarded for sharing

with reddit karma? with twitter likes? with traffic to his product website? no. we build a universal reputation... why || user, community needs || problems || goals text text Experienced Ethereum community members want to share their knowledge in exchange for reputation or $.

needs

motivation \\ why \\ reason \\ theory 1................................. ......................................... text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text te

the web3 newbie needs mentorship

She works at web2.com & is starting an Ethereum DApp side project.

needs, goals

She has a rough idea what to build, but its hard to get an overview on related content.

  • Which projects build similar stuff?
  • Who can guide me?
  • Where to ask questions?
  • Where to follow the most recent news?
  • Is that code secure?
  • Can I trust that team to maintain their code?

current problems

right now, there are two ways to find information

  • search your way through google, reddit, stackoverflow, etc.
  • or follow a guide on social media

search is focused on content, but monetizing content = ads.

social gives you guiding experts, but also continuous noise.

); } export default ProblemSection;
